content:
|   | RGBA Alignment | Motion Quality |
|---|---|---|
| AnimateDiff [16]+LayerDiff [64] | 6.7% | 21.7% |
| Ours + CogVideoX [57] | **93.3%** | **78.3%** |
caption: Table 1: User Study.
description: This table presents the results of a user study comparing two different methods for generating RGBA videos.  The study evaluated two key aspects of the generated videos: 1) the alignment between the RGB and alpha channels (how well they match), and 2) the quality of the motion in the videos (how well the motion matches the intended description in the text prompt). The table shows the percentage of users who rated each method positively for each aspect.
